Software.Name: Operating System
Sistema operacional
Software.Description: O sistema operacional é o maior pedaço de software em Software Inc. A maioria dos softwares precisa de um sistema operacional para rodar em. Quando as pessoas param de comprar uma linha de sistemas operacionais, eles também vão parar de comprar software para eles.

Feature.Name: Terminal
Terminal
Feature.Description: The terminal is the classic text-based interface between the Operating System and the user.

Feature.Name: GUI
GUI
Feature.Description: The Graphical User Interface allow users to actually visualize what they are doing. No longer will they be bound to inputting one line at a time.

Feature.Name: Input system
Entrada de dados
Feature.Description: Permitir ao utilizador interagir com o sistema operativo

Feature.Name: Plug'n'Play
Plug'n'Play
Feature.Description: Permitir ao utilizador interagir com o sistema operacional em qualquer número de maneiras

Feature.Name: Touch
Toque
Feature.Description: You can never have enough greasy finger prints on a surface

Feature.Name: Multithreading
Multithreading
Feature.Description: Multithreading allows the Operating System to run mulitple threads at the same time by continually switching between them intelligently, speeding up applications and confusing developers to no end.

Feature.Name: Multitasking
Multitasking
Feature.Description: Let your users pretend they can multitask by having several applications open at any one time.

Feature.Name: Networking
Rede
Feature.Description: How will anonymous people troll each other all over the world without this handy feature?

Feature.Name: Auto-update
Atualização automática
Feature.Description: Keep bugs and malware out, while annoying users with broken drivers and sudden restarts.

Feature.Name: 64-bit
64-bit
Feature.Description: Doubles the size of bits per register, allowing for bigger numbers, more memory, larger files, the answer to life, etc.

Feature.Name: PC speaker
PC speaker
Feature.Description: For all your beeping needs

Feature.Name: HD audio
Audio HD
Feature.Description: Like 8-bit audio, but with more bit

Software.Name: 2D Editor
Editor 2D
Software.Description: Programa que lhe permite lidar com 2 matrizes dimensionais de informação de cor

Feature.Name: Image rendering
Image rendering
Feature.Description: Actually display an image on the screen

Feature.Name: Image effects
Image effects
Feature.Description: Needs more swirl

Feature.Name: Cinematic filter
Cinematic filter
Feature.Description: Instant professionalism

Feature.Name: Vertex editing
Vertex editing
Feature.Description: Move points in space around on the screen

Feature.Name: Rendering
Rendering
Feature.Description: Process the points into a picture

Feature.Name: Animation
Animation
Feature.Description: Make the points move themselves

Feature.Name: Sculpting
Sculpting
Feature.Description: Pretend the points are clay

Feature.Name: Voxel sculpting
Voxel sculpting
Feature.Description: Everything is a point

Feature.Name: Physics
Physics
Feature.Description: Make the points interact

Feature.Name: Realistic hair
Realistic hair
Feature.Description: Make lines between the points

Feature.Name: Particles
Particles
Feature.Description: Spray points all over the place

Feature.Name: Liquid simulation
Liquid simulation
Feature.Description: Spill points all over the place

Feature.Name: PBR
PBR
Feature.Description: Physically Based Rendering simulates photons reacting with the points

Feature.Name: Distributed rendering
Distributed rendering
Feature.Description: Process the points into a picture on many computers at once

Software.Name: Audio Tool
Audio Tool
Software.Description: The audio tool is for recording and mixing sound effects and music.

Feature.Name: Virtual instruments
Virtual instruments
Feature.Description: Guitar? MIDI Keyboard. Violin? MIDI Keyboard. Drums? MIDI Keyboard. Saxophone? Yes.

Feature.Name: Autotune
Autotune
Feature.Description: This is a thing

Software.Name: Game Engine
Engine de Jogos
Software.Description: The game engine is what powers a game. It contains everything needed for a game, except for the creativity.

Feature.Name: Visual editor
Visual editor

2D assets
Feature.Description: Help the developer along with some prepackaged assets

3D assets

VR

Advanced shaders
Feature.Description: Not everything has to be flat! The irony is not lost on me

Shadows

Scripting

Visual scripting

VR

Multiplayer

Entrada avançada de dados

Cenas avançadas

ráficos vetoriais

Efeitos sonoros

Scripting

Software.Name: Antivirus
Antivirus
Software.Description: Proteger os computadores de desordeiros digitais desde que se tornou rentável para fazê-lo.

Interface de usuário
Feature.Description: Tornar mais fácil para o usuário a gerenciar sua manipulação do vírus

Escaneamento de e-mail
Feature.Description: Há sempre espaço para o alargamento

Base de dados de virus

Qualidade de software
